## Problem 1
Import and tidy data
```{r}
NYC_Transit = 
  read_csv("data_hw2/nyc_subway.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  gather(key = "type", value = "routes_served", route1:route11) %>%
  select(line, station_name, station_latitude, station_longitude, routes_served, entry, vending, entrance_type, ada)
NYC_Transit$entry = ifelse(NYC_Transit$entry == 'YES', TRUE,FALSE)

```
